content:
The HL7 Terminology Services Management Group is now being formed and they're looking for people with a background in terminology (both expertise and implementation) to join.

If you have a background in one or more of the following, please email me, Rob McClure and Anne Wizauer with your interest and CV.

  • FHIR Standards
  • CDA Standards
  • V2 Standards
  • A FHIR Implementer
  • A CDA Implementer
  • A Version 2 Implementer
  • Up to 3 at large members to represent other perspectives.
    • Terminology (Service) Implementer Perspective
    • Terminology Vendor

At least 2 members should (also) be members of HL7 Affiliates.

Needs:

  • Tooling knowledge
  • Implementation knowledge
  • Terminology view of standards development
what about members from terminology authoring organizations outside HL7?
They have to be HL7 members to be a part of the management group
understood... but there didn't seem to be a role listed for external terminology creators
That was included as "Terminology Vendor" but that's a good clarification
what about external SDO that use HL7 terminology services?
terminology vendor? wow, leave it to terminology people to bend words in odd ways
If a person has significant knowledge of terminology and/or terminology operations, then they're welcome as long as they're an HL7 member
